titleStmt.title: The Late K. James's commission to his privateers to ravage, plunder, burn, sink, and destroy all the ships and goods of the people of England, Scotland, and Ireland : with remarks thereupon.
titleStmt.author: James II, King of England, 1633-1701. To our trusty and well-beloved, Captain Patrick Lambert.

notesStmt.note: Contains extract of a commission written by James II to Captain Patrick Lambert, privateer.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
